name: Nectarine Neufchatel Cheesecake
author: Anonymous
summary: Using fresh California peaches, neufchatel (1/3 less fat cream cheese) and non-fat yogurt, this cheesecake recipe is  slimmed down without losing any vibrant flavor.
ingredients: 12 ounces Neufchatel (1/3 less fat cream cheese), at room temperature
⅓ cup fat-free plain or Greek yogurt
1 (6 ounce) ready-to-use natural graham cracker pie crust (with no trans fat)
2 each fresh California nectarine, pitted and diced
directions: Beat cream cheese, yogurt, sugar and extracts with an electric mixer until smooth
Add egg whites and eggs, beat just until smooth
Pour into crust and bake for 35 minutes or until center is nearly set
Cool on rack, then refrigerate for 3 hours or until well chilled
Whisk together honey and lemon juice in a medium bowl
Add nectarines and mint and toss gently
Just before serving, top each slice with nectarine mixture
